div.div:
Cobden Unit School District is a wonderfully diverse school community with a staff of highly qualified professional educators and support personnel that is committed to providing our students many opportunities both inside and outside of the classroom. We are one of only 200 schools nationwide to be recognized as a model PLC school. Our motto is to work collaboratively to provide the highest levels of learning for all students and we are very proud to say, we accomplish this on a daily basis.
Cobden Dist. 17 is a forward thinking school recognizing the importance of technology in education. In addition to Promethean boards in every classroom, access to 3D printers, iPads and various other pieces of technology, we are also a Google Apps for Education school where every high school student is issued a chromebook. Our dedicated faculty and staff utilize the chromebooks and Google Classroom regularly to provide their students with a rich, standards based, meaningful curriculum.
Cobden schools are proud to be leading the way in preparing our students to be 21st century citizens.

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout that’s similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click ‘read more’ to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. You’ll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
